title: fee waiver at PESU?
content:
I belong to 2B category and my annual income is less than 1.5L  
is there any fee waiver options at PESU or any state govt scholarships i can apply for?  
kindly guide me...

comments.body:
I replied to you on the rvce post as well lol
You are eligible for snq quota so fees if you get through kcet would be 21,300
And pes does have scholarships Top 5% get 50% scholarship based on cgpa 
And the next 20% get 40% scholarship based on sgpa

But not sure if they will give scholarship on the reduced fees contact the helpline ig 

[link to check it out yourself ](https://pes.edu/scholarships/)
yeah i posted at rvce too... thankss mann!
do you have any idea on state govt scholarships?
there are no snq seats in PESU.
Asking for clarification - Is it individual income or the combined family annual income that should be less than 1.5 lakh to be eligible for scholarship?
